subject: Baseball
Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder
lead_paragraph: Only when Andres Torres, the Mets’ new center fielder, accepted the extent of his attention deficit hyperactivity disorder did he begin to blossom as a ballplayer.
snippet: Only when Andres Torres, the Mets’ new center fielder, accepted the extent of his attention deficit hyperactivity disorder did he begin to blossom as a ballplayer.
